title: Climbing The Mountain Once Again - WTTF T=206
author: OriginalTrekkerMike

posts.post_title: Climbing The Mountain Once Again - WTTF T=206
posts.post_content:
I have decided to make another run at the Monster (my 3rd attempt I think) and am looking to trade the cards bellow for T-206s:

My target condition for all cards is F-G, but I am willing to accept lower condition cards (as long as they are intact and free of rips, tears and missing pieces) with the idea that I'll upgrade them later.  Right now, I have 6 different cards so chances are you have something I need.  Let's make a deal!
Friendly bump...I've made a couple of trades so I'm now up to 14 cards.  Plenty of trade bait still available or make me a cash offer on any of the cards above.
Bump to the top...Having good luck with trading - hope it continues!
Bump to the top...Let's make a deal!
It's been awhile...Let's see if I can get some action going with this.
